phrases: Even though it is easy to say I love you
when you stand in front of me
my personality stands up and gets in my way.
I can usually pull through with my assertiveness
that is just how I am.
But no matter how hard I try, I cannot break the wall that is between us.
I want you to realise my feelings.
So I always send a gaze
of I really love you your way
After meeting you, I finally realised
that I am really clumsy when it comes to love.
The scars from love that I would almost forgotten
have started to ache all of a sudden.
Someday, like how I normally would...
I must say I love you, or else I will become even weaker.
On the nights I cannot sleep
Within the vast world, a single seed
and put out a fruit that was still unripe.
The fruit that I wish would turn orange soon
The ideals and dreams just swell -
Today, I tried eating an orange
but it was so sour I cried.
I could not leave it behind like I have been
I love it I feel like crying.
I love it I love it.
so I will be going to the
so I will be going to the
so I will be going to the
so I will be going to the
so I will be going to the
so I will be going to the
so I will be going to the
The Road We Must Advance on
I want him to be with Minorin,
but it is just too painful.
Yeah, I guess it cannot be helped.
This all must be very traumatic for you, considering you are such good friends with Aisaka-san.
Since you just had a nightmare, Takasu-kun,
let me remind you that the printout is due tomorrow.
I will repeat it again for everyone.
Let us stop here for today.
In the end, we were not seriously injured, and the rescue team saved us.
Then Taiga's real mother came to pick her up at the resort.
The teacher told me that Aisaka is not doing so great,
so she is resting at her parents' place...
Did you hear anything about that?
No, I could not reach her cell phone.
I have a favour to ask of you.
Pretend that you are the one who saved Taiga.
tell her she was unconscious the whole time and said nothing at all.
Is this related to the favour Taiga asked me on New Year's?
Want to go out somewhere nice?
Yeah, let us eat some good food!
Do not let Taiga be the only thing on your -
Are not the people inside taking a bit too long?
Takasu, I am not keeping you from cooking dinner, right?
I am sorry for forcing you to come.
It is okay, I will not go home until I taste the food here.
I do not want to go home either.
My parents will just ask what I am going to do with my life.
There is no need to be so nervous.
This career assessment is just so they can decide how to split up the classes.
Notocchi, you are going into liberal arts, right?
Yeah, I want to go into liberal arts and become an editor for a music magazine,
I would be happy just to graduate.
Well, I will have to work for my dad anyway.
I am sorry for being surprised, but you guys are actually thinking about your futures...
Geez, what are you talking about?
Taka-chan, you are smart enough that you will not have any problems.
You are going into sciences, right?
It should be easy for you and Master Kitamura to pass the national testing.
Not really, I still have not decided if I am going to college -
Come on, find a seat and sit down!
Have you checked on her yet?
Since daytime is shorter in winter they are already over.
By the way, I will poke your eyes out if you say coal noodles.
I am sorry, three ramen please.
Yeah, the hourly wage is pretty nice, so I will try two hours.
Why do you have so many jo -
He is going to open his eyes.
We would never have guessed that she rejected you if you had not told us.
Speaking of which, how are things going with Maya-sama?
Is she not back because she is really not feeling well,
or is her mother being selfish like her father and not letting her come?
Just put something like I will study hard, and you will be fine.
Even if I make it to a four year college, how much money do you think it will cost?
It is all right, do not worry about money.
You are different from Ya-chan because you are smart.
You will be able to live a great life!
Look, is not there a saying?
A jewel will not shine if it is not polished?
Ryuu-chan, it is like you are shining when you study!
If I work and make around fifty thousand a month...
Working at Inage-san's is just an exception within an exception.
How do you know about it?
You will not be able to study if you work, right?
Also, we will not be able to have dinner together.
A life like that is pointless!
You will not be happy at all!
But you always tell me to go to college -
She is always been like that.
It is all right, you are no different from other children, even if you do not have a father.
You will be perfectly happy forever!
Taiga previously said that she is on good terms with her real mum.
I think she is probably happy to be around her.
Oh, you are here too, Takasu.
Do not tell me you are here for the budget estimate.
I am sorry, I will turn it in later!
Yeah, I will be counting on you, new team captain!
My, the new student council president sure is busy.
Were not you already the team captain?
Well, Kitamura's student council is really busy,
so they merged the male and the female softball team,
and I was appointed the new team captain.
I will probably become as busy as Kitamura-kun, since I am unlucky.
T-Then, why are you getting another job?
Will not that make you busier?
Have not you heard the saying that young people must endure hardship, Takasu-kun?
Would not that hinder both sides -
I am working hard because I do not want to hinder anyone.
That is because it is something that can be seen.
You are beautiful as usual today!
What is with that attitude, Kawashima?
When the child is not here, the father can do anything he wants.
Hey, class is about to start!
Do you plan to skip first?
I wanted to tell you this a long time ago.
What is left to say after all that?
It appears between those two vending machines.
I heard it was a heartbroken girl who took her -
Why did not you tell me earlier?!
But nothing has happened so far, right?
I think ghosts have their own personality too.
They will only appear in front of people who they want to see and understand them.
I think I have seen a ghost before, however...
and then lose the things I can see.
You talk too much, I do not want to hear the whole thing.
You will understand after you have heard the whole thing!
You want to say that if I just watch and do not interfere,
everything will turn out fine, right?
Whatever, talking to you feels like having a period.
I will look forward and try to get what I want!
I will not hesitate anymore, I swear!
Well, this is about your career assessment.
I am sorry, I still have not talked to my family about it.
Then, do you still feel the same as at the beginning of this year?
You are an overachieving student, and I expect a lot from you,
which is why I am concerned about this.
That is how being a teacher is.
Please do not have expectations for me, my family is poor.
If you need it, there are different scholarships and financial aids -
Is it so strange to not go to college?
It is just that I could not tell with just this career assessment...
It is how you feel about it, not how others feel about it.
So that is what she means by, There is always a way?
Did not she also say it would be pointless if a mother and son did not have dinner together?
Ryuu-chan, it is like you are shining when you study!
How can I give it to her now?
How is a love letter embarrassing?
Since I do not have the guts to confess to her, I can only imagine like this.
It is horribly miserable, but I do not think it is embarrassing!
That is right, the feeling of liking someone is not embarrassing.
I cannot say that to the person who likes me!
I just cannot say it even if I want to!
What is more, she is not answering my calls!
Where were you, and who were you with?!
You idiot, pig, dog, yaksha, asura, gorilla!
You tried to strangle me and looked at me with weird eyes...
I-I was just surprised because you appeared out of nowhere!
You did not even call me.
You have to explain everything to me in detail!
Do not tell me you did not come back because you -
The wound is not that bad.
The thing about me not doing so great was a lie.
I just wanted to skip school.
I-I see, so you are all right...
I had not seen my mum for a long time.
and we went shopping, to restaurants, and movies and stuff.
I was just being a child!
Did not you say you were not going to come over anymore?
I am going to go in through the window from your room.
I will use the three-second rule.
C-Can you do it within three seconds?
Hey, why do not you have dinner here?
There are some fermented beans left, so I will just add some onions -
It is okay, I already had dinner.
O-Oh yeah, Inko-chan wants to say hi to you!
Yeah, it is his new greeting!
Did that ugly bird get fatter?
It is because you are not here to stress him -
He is eating too much because he is so lonely.
He is as ugly as ever.
As I thought, being with Taiga is the best.
I was just cleaning out stuff because I had time...
Look, I did not have time at the end of last year...
I am really clumsy, but I finally understood after what happened.
Even if I am clumsy, I can still be serious.
I cannot stop thinking about it...
Hey, did you find out Minorin's true feelings yet?
Do not tell me you did not ask her because of the fuss I caused...
Why is she worrying about me?
I promise I will not be clumsy anymore.
It is all right, do not worry.
Things will definitely turn out fine between you and Minorin.
Do not just stand there, come and help me!
I always forget to lock the window.
A highly secured mansion is not always convenient.
You, Kitamura-kun, and Minorin went to look for me, right?
You do not remember, do you?
Yeah, but I had a dream.
In my dreams, Kitamura-kun was carrying me on his back,
and I muttered something stupid to him...
Does she want to pretend she did not say anything?
Kitamura-kun did carry you on his back,
but you did not say anything because you were unconscious.
That is what I heard, at least.
For a second, I was worried that it had been real.
